long_description: With a size that is more compact than the original, the 600ml OllyDog OllyBottle comes with a bowl that lets you and your dog share water without sharing slobber. Form-fitting bowl snaps onto the exterior of the water bottle for convenient carrying with minimal added volume. Eastman Tritan plastic is BPA-free and dishwasher safe. The OllyDog OllyBottle features a large opening that makes it easy to fill and clean.
short_description: With a size that is more compact than the original, the 600ml OllyDog OllyBottle comes with a bowl that lets you and your dog share water without sharing slobber.
